title: Fractals in Africanist Music
authors:
Claudio G\'omez-Gonz\'ales, Sidhanth Raman, Siddharth Viswanath and
  Jesse Wolfson
abstract:
We investigate fractal structures in African and African diasporic music,
building on hypotheses of choreographer Reggie Wilson and research on fractals
in African material culture by Ron Eglash.
